movies.title: You Got Served
movies.description: Two friends compete in a street dancing competition to earn respect and prize money.

movies.title: War for the Planet of the Apes
movies.description: Caesar and his apes fight a battle against a ruthless Colonel in this climactic final chapter.

movies.title: Smile 2
movies.description: Following the events of the first movie, Smile 2 dives deeper into a new and haunting mystery.
